protein.general_function: Involved in oxidoreductase activity, acting on a sulfur group of donors, disulfide as acceptor
protein.specific_function: Has an important function as a repair enzyme for proteins that have been inactivated by oxidation. Catalyzes the reversible oxidation-reduction of methionine sulfoxide in proteins to methionine.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on a sulfur group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on a sulfur group of donors, disulfide as acceptor
